Operation 'FetchAuthorize' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description is extremely vague and repetitive. It lacks critical context about OAuth flow, doesn't explain the purpose (user consent/authorization), missing input parameter details (client_id, redirect_uri, scope, state), missing output details (returns URI string), and doesn't clarify this is step 1 of OAuth flow. Enhanced version provides domain-appropriate OAuth terminology, explains the action clearly, details expected inputs and outputs, and helps AI agents understand when to use this operation in an OAuth authorization flow.

data.summary_suggestion: Generate OAuth authorization URI for user consent
data.description_suggestion: Generates an OAuth 2.0 authorization URI that redirects users to the Twilio authorization endpoint for granting permissions. Accepts parameters including client_id, redirect_uri, scope, state, and response_type to configure the authorization request. Returns a complete authorization URI that should be presented to the user's browser. This is the first step in the OAuth authorization code flow.
data.reasoning: Original description is extremely vague and repetitive. It lacks critical context about OAuth flow, doesn't explain the purpose (user consent/authorization), missing input parameter details (client_id, redirect_uri, scope, state), missing output details (returns URI string), and doesn't clarify this is step 1 of OAuth flow. Enhanced version provides domain-appropriate OAuth terminology, explains the action clearly, details expected inputs and outputs, and helps AI agents understand when to use this operation in an OAuth authorization flow.

message: Operation 'CreateToken' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description uses awkward phrasing ('in exchange of') and lacks clarity on the complete token exchange process. Missing critical input details (which parameters are required vs optional, what grant_type values are supported), missing output details (token response structure, expiration), missing side effects (tokens cannot be reused, grant is consumed), and doesn't clarify this is step 2 of OAuth flow. Enhanced version uses proper OAuth terminology, explains the complete exchange process, details all expected inputs and outputs, clarifies the token response structure, and helps AI agents understand the full context of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_summary: Issues a new Access token (optionally identity_token & refresh_token) in exchange of Oauth grant
data.current_description: Issues a new Access token (optionally identity_token & refresh_token) in exchange of Oauth grant
data.summary_suggestion: Exchange OAuth grant for access and refresh tokens
data.description_suggestion: Exchanges an OAuth authorization grant for access tokens and optionally identity and refresh tokens. Accepts grant_type, code, redirect_uri, client_id, and client_secret as required parameters to validate the authorization grant. Returns a token response object containing access_token, token_type, expires_in, and optionally identity_token and refresh_token based on the requested scopes. This completes the OAuth authorization code flow. Tokens are issued upon successful grant validation and cannot be reused.
data.reasoning: Original description uses awkward phrasing ('in exchange of') and lacks clarity on the complete token exchange process. Missing critical input details (which parameters are required vs optional, what grant_type values are supported), missing output details (token response structure, expiration), missing side effects (tokens cannot be reused, grant is consumed), and doesn't clarify this is step 2 of OAuth flow. Enhanced version uses proper OAuth terminology, explains the complete exchange process, details all expected inputs and outputs, clarifies the token response structure, and helps AI agents understand the full context of when and how to use this operation.
